page_structure.perspective: admin dashboard for renters management with flat modern minimalist design

geometry.proportions: full-width layout with max-width container, modular grid system

composition.element_count: 5 main sections: header, navigation, search-actions, data-table, pagination
composition.spatial_depth: layered with subtle soft neumorphism effects
composition.scale_consistency: hierarchical typography scale, consistent component sizing
composition.scene_density: moderate information density with clear visual hierarchy and generous whitespace

lighting.type: soft ambient lighting with subtle highlights
lighting.shadow: very subtle shadows for soft neumorphism effect
lighting.highlighting: gentle edge illumination on interactive elements

render_quality.resolution: high-resolution web rendering with crisp typography
render_quality.edge_definition: rounded corners with consistent border radius
render_quality.visual_clarity: clean, readable layout with proper contrast ratios

background.style: clean modern background with subtle patterns

page_structure.stylistic_tone: professional, trustworthy, modern admin dashboard with lime accent

page_behavior.scalability: responsive design for all device sizes
page_behavior.accessibility: WCAG 2.1 AA compliant with proper contrast and navigation

style_rules.typography: text-3xl font-bold text-black for page title
style_rules.responsive: mobile-first with tablet and desktop breakpoints

style_rules.container: flex gap-6 p-6 bg-white border-b border-gray-100
style_rules.active_tab: bg-lime-yellow text-black px-6 py-3 rounded-lg font-semibold shadow-md
style_rules.inactive_tab: text-gray-600 hover:text-black px-6 py-3 rounded-lg font-medium hover:bg-gray-50

style_rules.container: flex justify-between items-center p-6 bg-white rounded-lg shadow-md
style_rules.search_input: rounded-lg border border-gray-200 px-4 py-3 focus:border-lime-yellow focus:ring-2 focus:ring-lime-yellow/20
style_rules.add_button: bg-black hover:bg-gray-800 text-white px-6 py-3 rounded-lg font-semibold shadow-md

style_rules.container: bg-white rounded-lg shadow-md border border-gray-100 overflow-hidden
style_rules.header_cell: px-6 py-4 text-left text-sm font-semibold text-black
style_rules.body_cell: px-6 py-4 text-sm text-gray-700 border-b border-gray-50

style_rules.container: flex justify-between items-center p-6 bg-white rounded-lg shadow-md
style_rules.button: px-4 py-2 rounded-lg border border-gray-200 hover:bg-gray-50 hover:border-lime-yellow

style_rules.backdrop: fixed inset-0 bg-black bg-opacity-50 flex items-center justify-center
style_rules.container: bg-white rounded-lg shadow-xl max-w-md w-full mx-4
style_rules.actions: px-6 py-4 border-t border-gray-100 flex justify-end gap-3

style_rules.backdrop: fixed inset-0 bg-black bg-opacity-50 flex items-center justify-center
style_rules.container: bg-white rounded-lg shadow-xl max-w-md w-full mx-4 p-6

desktop.layout: full table view with optimal spacing

accessibility_features.keyboard_navigation: full keyboard support with focus indicators
accessibility_features.screen_reader: semantic HTML with proper ARIA labels
accessibility_features.focus_management: visible focus indicators with lime-yellow color
accessibility_features.table_accessibility: proper headers, row associations, and captions
